originalTitle: This army chief threatened to castrate opposition leader and claimed descent from Jesus
title: This army chief threatened to castrate opposition leader and claimed descent from Jesus
content: The president’s son, notorious for explosive remarks on X, has ambitions to  succeed his father.

originalTitle: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
title: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
content: Prosecutors say Mamadou Hawa Gassama described Alassane Ouattara as a "tyrant" and "an enemy of Mali".

originalTitle: South Africa and Israel expel each other's envoys in diplomatic row
title: South Africa and Israel expel each other's envoys in diplomatic row
content: South Africa accuses the Israeli envoy of insulting President Ramaphosa. Israel says the expulsion is "baseless".

originalTitle: Shipping giant Maersk to take over Panama Canal ports after court ruling
title: Shipping giant Maersk to take over Panama Canal ports after court ruling
content: Danish company will replace Hong Kong-based firm after Trump claimed strategic waterway was controlled by China.

originalTitle: Wave of Israeli air strikes hit southern Lebanon despite ceasefire
title: Wave of Israeli air strikes hit southern Lebanon despite ceasefire
content: Israeli air strikes pound areas in southern Lebanon in violation of the November 2024 ceasefire with Hezbollah.

originalTitle: Venezuela’s acting President Delcy Rodriguez announces prisoner amnesty
title: Venezuela’s acting President Delcy Rodriguez announces prisoner amnesty
content: Rodriguez calls for healing 'wounds left by political confrontation' and says notorious El Helicoide prison to shut.

originalTitle: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released Epstein files
content: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

originalTitle: Schitt's Creek and Home Alone star Catherine O'Hara dies aged 71
title: Schitt's Creek and Home Alone star Catherine O'Hara dies aged 71
content: The Emmy-winning actress died at her home in Los Angeles on Friday after a brief illness, her agent said.

originalTitle: What we learned - and didn't - from the Melania documentary
title: What we learned - and didn't - from the Melania documentary
content: Melania, directed by Brett Ratner, provides a fleeting glimpse into the life of the enigmatic first lady.

title: I never stopped believing - Calvert-Lewin
content: Leeds striker Dominic Calvert-Lewin sits down with BBC Sport's Betty Glover to talk about his return to goalscoring form, being a free agent and his England chances.

originalTitle: Nine siblings and a dog called Zoomer - Wirtz in his own words
title: Nine siblings and a dog called Zoomer - Wirtz in his own words
content: Florian Wirtz sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his slow start at Anfield, playing padel and making Bundesliga history.

originalTitle: Are Arsenal fans making team nervous in title race?
title: Are Arsenal fans making team nervous in title race?
content: Is a nervousness among Arsenal fans affecting the players in the Premier League title race? Alex Howell looks at what impact this could have on Mikel Arteta's side as they look to end a run of three second-placed finishes.
